      • addCardOnBoard

        public void addCardOnBoard​(java.lang.String card,
                           java.lang.String color,
                           java.lang.String path,
                           java.lang.String description)
        Display god card, color associated to the player and description god card drawn
        Parameters:
        card - is the god card drawn from the deck
        color - is the color univocal associated to the user
        path - is the relative path of the card image
        description - is the power of the god card

      • addOpponentsOnBoard

        public void addOpponentsOnBoard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> opponents,
                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> opponentsGods)
        This method writes on the board the opponents players in the game
        Parameters:
        opponents - are nicknames of other players
        opponentsGods - are names of cards drawn by other players
